description: API Examples for Oraculus Variable System

templates.title: Fantasy Adventure
templates.description: A customizable fantasy adventure with magical elements

templates.title: Sci-Fi Exploration
templates.description: A space exploration adventure with technology and alien worlds

get_template_variables_response.title: Fantasy Adventure
get_template_variables_response.description: A customizable fantasy adventure with magical elements

setting.name: setting
setting.description: The world/location where the adventure takes place

magical_item.name: magical_item
magical_item.description: A magical item the protagonist encounters

threat_level.name: threat_level
threat_level.description: How dangerous the adventure should be

generate_story_success_response.story:
You awaken in a enchanted_forest, feeling disoriented and unsure of how you arrived here.
As a adult female A scholar seeking ancient knowledge, you notice a glowing_crystal nearby that seems to pulse with otherworldly energy.
The air crackles with magic, and you sense that this place holds both great promise and danger (threat level: 6/10).
The path ahead is shrouded in mystery, and your choices will determine your fate in this realm.

details: Variable 'setting' must be one of: enchanted_forest, ancient_castle, mystical_mountains, underground_dungeon

custom_template_creation_request.title: Mystery Investigation
custom_template_creation_request.description: A detective mystery with customizable elements
custom_template_creation_request.story_template: You are investigating a {crime_type} in {location}. As a {age_range} {gender} detective, you notice {clue_type} that might be important. The atmosphere is {mood} and you sense this case has a {difficulty} level of complexity.

variable_resolution_examples.template_text_with_variables: Hello {name}! As a {age_range} {gender_category} {situation}, you find a {magical_item} in the {setting}. Danger level: {threat_level}/10.
variable_resolution_examples.resolved_text: Hello Alex! As a young male A student on an adventure, you find a ancient_scroll in the enchanted_forest. Danger level: 4/10.
